pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū—“bhagavatā paṭikkhittaṃ suddhakāḷakānaṃ eḷakalomānaṃ santhataṃ kārāpetun”ti, te thokaññeva odātaṃ ante ādiyitvā tatheva suddhakāḷakānaṃ eḷakalomānaṃ santhataṃ kārāpenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:1.3: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:1.4: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū thokaññeva odātaṃ ante ādiyitvā tatheva suddhakāḷakānaṃ eḷakalomānaṃ santhataṃ kārāpessantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:1.5: Atha kho te bhikkhū chabbaggiye bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:1.6: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, thokaññeva odātaṃ ante ādiyitvā tatheva suddhakāḷakānaṃ eḷakalomānaṃ santhataṃ kārāpethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:1.9: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, thokaññeva odātaṃ ante ādiyitvā tatheva suddhakāḷakānaṃ eḷakalomānaṃ santhataṃ kārāpessatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:1.11: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:1.12: “Navaṃ pana bhikkhunā santhataṃ kārayamānena dve bhāgā suddhakāḷakānaṃ eḷakalomānaṃ ādātabbā tatiyaṃ odātānaṃ catutthaṃ gocariyānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:1.13: Anādā ce bhikkhu dve bhāge suddhakāḷakānaṃ eḷakalomānaṃ tatiyaṃ odātānaṃ catutthaṃ gocariyānaṃ navaṃ santhataṃ kārāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:2.13: Anādā ce bhikkhu dve bhāge suddhakāḷakānaṃ eḷakalomānaṃ tatiyaṃ odātānaṃ catutthaṃ gocariyānanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:2.14: Anādiyitvā dve tule suddhakāḷakānaṃ eḷakalomānaṃ tulaṃ odātānaṃ tulaṃ gocariyānaṃ navaṃ santhataṃ karoti vā kārāpeti vā payoge dukkaṭaṃ,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:2.16: Nissajjitabbaṃ saṃghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:2.19: “idaṃ me, bhante, santhataṃ anādiyitvā dve tule suddhakāḷakānaṃ eḷakalomānaṃ tulaṃ odātānaṃ tulaṃ gocariyānaṃ kārāpitaṃ nissaggiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:2.24: Attanā vippakataṃ attanā pariyosāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:2.25: Attanā vippakataṃ parehi pariyosāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:2.26: Parehi vippakataṃ attanā pariyosāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:2.27: Parehi vippakataṃ parehi pariyosāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:2.28: Aññassatthāya karoti vā kārāpeti vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:2.29: Aññena kataṃ paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:2.31: tulaṃ odātānaṃ tulaṃ gocariyānaṃ ādiyitvā karoti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:2.32: bahutaraṃ odātānaṃ bahutaraṃ gocariyānaṃ ādiyitvā karoti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:2.33: suddhaṃ odātānaṃ suddhaṃ gocariyānaṃ ādiyitvā karoti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:2.34: vitānaṃ vā bhūmattharaṇaṃ vā sāṇipākāraṃ vā bhisiṃ vā bibbohanaṃ vā karoti,
